name: A Remote Planet
Lore: 'In unfamiliar and potentially hostile territory, Qui-Gon knew that success would require patience and caution.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. At [Episode I] Tatooine battleground sites, your Force drains are +1 and opponent''s cards with ability are deploy -1. While Padme at a Tatooine battleground site, opponent''s Force drains at related [Episode I] sites are -1. Place Effect in Used Pile if canceled.',
